citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany the APHIS Official during the inspection process at 1:35pm on
Thursday, April 3, 2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee upon arriving at the facility but was told by a
family member that the licensee was away and not expected back for a few hours. Failure to provide access to the facility,
animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in
enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany the APHIS Official during the inspection process at 1:35pm on 
Thursday, April 3, 2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee upon arriving at the facility but was told by a 
family member that the licensee was away and not expected back for a few hours. Failure to provide access to the facility, 
animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in 
enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
